ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant""Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubellacontraindications * Tabs: Rubella
Live attentuated Hepatitis A-containing vaccine is contraindicated"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" (where "Type of hepatitis A dose" = "Live attenuated hepatitis A vaccine")"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" (where "Type of hepatitis A dose" = "Live attenuated hepatitis A vaccine") Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications * Tabs: HepatitisA
Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client and may pose a theoretical risk to the developing fetus.Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client and may pose a theoretical risk to the developing fetus.Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client and may pose a theoretical risk to the developing fetus. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications * Tabs: HepatitisA
The client is severely immunocompromised"Potential contraindications" = "Severely immunocompromised""Potential contraindications" = "Severely immunocompromised" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Poliocontraindications * Tabs: Polio
Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunocompromised clients.Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunocompromised clients.Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunocompromised clients. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications * Tabs: HepatitisA
The client has a history of severe allergic reactions"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions""Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Hibcontraindications * Tabs: Hib
Hepatitis A vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications * Tabs: HepatitisA
Do not vaccinate client with inactivated hepatitis A vaccination if client has had a severe allergic reaction to the previous dose.Do not vaccinate client with live attenuated hepatitis A vaccination if client has severe allergy to components included in the live attenuated hepatitis A-containing vaccines.Do not vaccinate client with live attenuated hepatitis A vaccination if client has severe allergy to components included in the live attenuated hepatitis A-containing vaccines. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications * Tabs: HepatitisA

title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.HepatitisAcontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: Live attentuated Hepatitis A-containing vaccine is contraindicated
Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client and may pose a theoretical risk to the developing fetus.
Do not vaccinate client with hepatitis A as hepatitis A vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunocompromised clients.
The client has a history of severe allergic reactions
Hepatitis A vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Do not vaccinate client with inactivated hepatitis A vaccination if client has had a severe allergic reaction to the previous dose.
